spec_data.Name: perl-utils
spec_data.Description:
Several utilities which come with Perl distribution like h2ph, perlbug,
perlthanks, pl2pm, and splain. Some utilities are provided by more specific
packages like perldoc by perl-Pod-Perldoc.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 25 Sep 2017 10:51:00 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Utilities packaged with the Perl distribution
